synopsis.text:
Join the crew of the Quin Zaza, a daring airship soaring the skies in search of the most formidable and delectable creatures â€“ dragons! While most people fear these sky-dwelling beasts, the brave drakers aboard the Zaza specialize in hunting them down to provide the world with valuable resources such as medicine, oil, and the most exquisite cuisine.

Life as a draker is no easy feat, as each dragon presents unique challenges and maintaining an airship is both costly and tedious. Despite the dangers and societal ostracization, the crew of the Quin Zaza remains united in their pursuit of these scaly beasts. Among the crew are Takita, an eager newcomer; Mika, a skilled yet reckless hunter; and Jirou, a determined young man chasing both dragons and his past.

Experience the thrilling aerial battles, daring feats of skill, and strategic maneuvers as the Quin Zaza's crew faces the perils of dragon hunting. Witness their shared goal of capturing these magnificent creatures, knowing that each successful catch brings them not only wealth but also the finest culinary delights. Embark on this grand adventure filled with dreams, danger, and gourmet cooking!
